briefTitle: Thermal Suit With Forced-air Warming in Breast Cancer Surgery
officialTitle: Thermal Suit With Forced-air Warming in Breast Cancer Surgery: A Randomized Clinical Investigation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* primary breast cancer surgery
* unilateral resection or mastectomy with or without axillar lymphadenectomy
* body mass index 25-40

Exclusion Criteria:

* ASA \> III
* decreased mental status
* inadequate Finnish language skills
* other than general anaesthesia
